= Project Overview =

OpenSynth is the student project of Samuel Banina.  It will hopefully be an at least semi-playable virtual analog synthesizer.  It is written in Qt 4.2 and for the Linux platform.  


== Features ==

  * Mapping of standard keyboard into two separate rows of playable keys
  * Each row of keys will have their own separate controls
  * Controls include waveform selection, LFO, and envelope 

== Wishlist ==

  * MIDI compatibility
  * Port to other platforms
  * Reverb, Echo, and other Effects
